title: Q&A 및 피드백 처리 (Bridge)
intent: 질문에 전문적으로 대답하고 피드백을 수용하며 추가 논의를 효과적으로 관리한다.
lexset: question, clarify, explain, elaborate, feedback, comment, point, understand, appreciate, address

seeds.en: Let me elaborate on that point.
I'd like to clarify what you mean exactly.
I'll check on that and get back to you.
Thank you for that valuable feedback.
I see you're looking at it from a different perspective.
You've pointed out something I missed.
There's a way to address that concern.

seeds.kr: 더 질문 있으시면 언제든 말씀해 주세요.
seeds.en: Please feel free to ask if you have more questions.
Due to time constraints, I'll take one final question.
